page.title: 11JUNIOR SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: We start school at 9a.m. although some have to be there earlier as we have to do jobs such as giving out registers. At 9a.m. we go into our classroom. There are about 30 children of the same age group.We have 4 age age groups,from 7 to 11 years.When we first start Junior School everything seems big and feel very scared,but when you are in the 4th year everything seems small.We have 4 lessons a day.In these lessons we just learn basics like reading, writing and maths.We have a swimming pool so we learn to swim. We have a daily Assembly when the Headmaster talks to us.We play a variety of sports;Football,Athletics Netball,Rugby and Chess.There are also after school clubs run by the teachers for Dancing, Table Tennis and and Benchball.We have 2 breaks and a lunch hour each day.
